description: Detects suspicious log entries in Linux log files Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Log Entries
query: (*entered\ promiscuous\ mode* OR *Deactivating\ service* OR *Oversized\ packet\ received\ from* OR *imuxsock\ begins\ to\ drop\ messages*)
